TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IClientChannelSinkProvider

summary.span: Creates client channel sinks for the client channel through which remoting messages flow.

span.span: Creates client channel sinks for the client channel through which remoting messages flow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 구현을 통해 클라이언트 채널에 연결 된 채널 싱크는 인터페이스입니다.Channel sinks are connected to a client channel through implementations of the interface. 모든 원격 클라이언트 채널에는 생성자를 제공는 매개 변수로 합니다.All the remoting client channels provide constructors that take a as a parameter. 가 체인에 저장 된 채널 싱크 공급자 및 사용자가 외부 하나 채널 생성자에 전달 하기 전에 모든 채널 싱크 공급자를 함께 연결 해야 합니다.Channel sink providers are stored in a chain, and the user is responsible for chaining all channel sink providers together before passing the outer one to the channel constructor. 이라는 속성을 제공 이 목적을 위해 합니다. provides a property called for this purpose. 여러 채널 싱크 공급자 구성 파일에 지정 되어 원격 인프라 연결 합니다 구성 파일에서 발견 되는 순서에서입니다.When multiple channel sink providers are specified in a configuration file, the remoting infrastructure will chain them together in the order they are found in the configuration file. 채널 싱크 공급자 중에서 채널을 만들 때 생성 됩니다는 호출 합니다.The channel sink providers will be created when the channel is created during the call. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는이 인터페이스의 구현을 보여 줍니다.The following code example illustrates an implementation of this interface. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#30](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/clientsink.cpp#30)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/clientsink.cs#30)] 참조는 인터페이스 설명을 해당 클라이언트 싱크 구현에 대 한 예제입니다.See the interface documentation for an example of the corresponding client sink implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink CreateSink (System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender channel, string url, object remoteChannelData);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IClientChannelSink CreateSink(class System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.IChannelSender channel, string url, object remoteChannelData) cil managed
Public Function CreateSink (channel As IChannelSender, url As String, remoteChannelData As Object) As IClientChannelSink
public: System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IClientChannelSink ^ CreateSink(System::Runtime::Remoting::Channels::IChannelSender ^ channel, System::String ^ url, System::Object ^ remoteChannelData);

param.name: channel
param.span: Channel for which the current sink chain is being constructed.

span.span: Channel for which the current sink chain is being constructed.

param.name: url
param.span: The URL of the object to connect to.

span.span: The URL of the object to connect to.

param.span: This parameter can be if the connection is based entirely on the information contained in the remoteChannelData parameter.

span.span: This parameter can be if the connection is based entirely on the information contained in the remoteChannelData parameter.

param.name: remoteChannelData
param.span: A channel data object that describes a channel on the remote server.

span.span: A channel data object that describes a channel on the remote server.

returns.span: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain, or , which indicates that this provider will not or cannot provide a connection for this endpoint.

span.span: The first sink of the newly formed channel sink chain, or , which indicates that this provider will not or cannot provide a connection for this endpoint.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 경우는 메서드가 호출 되 면 자체 채널 싱크 전달 만듭니다는 체인 (있는 경우)에 있는 다음 싱크 공급자를 호출 하 고 현재 및 다음 싱크에서 서로 연결 되도록 합니다.When the method is called, it creates its own channel sink, forwards the call to the next sink provider in the chain (if there is one), and ensures that the next sink and the current one are linked together. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에서는이 메서드의 구현을 보여 줍니다.The following code example illustrates an implementation of this method. [!code-cpp[Remoting_Sinks#33](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CPP/clientsink.cpp#33)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_Sinks#33](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_Sinks/CS/clientsink.cs#33)]

exception.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

span.span: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

span.span: The next sink provider in the channel sink provider chain.
